item.title: Disposable Software: When generating code costs less than finding it
item.description: LLMs have made generating code nearly free, but maintaining it hasn't changed. On the growing plague of code that shouldn't exist and the discipline of searching before building.
item.author: ray.gavin97@gmail.com (Gavin Ray)

item.title: The Absurdity of the term "AI Engineer"
item.description: Integrating a third-party LLM SDK does not make you an AI Engineer: a rant on the inflation of job titles in the age of ChatGPT wrappers.
item.author: ray.gavin97@gmail.com (Gavin Ray)
